role.argrole: for whom / what ? (usually marked by ل)

example.parse: (S (S (NP-TPC-6 (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_NOM أي) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN طرح))) (NP-TMP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الآن)) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يسحب) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-6)) (NP-OBJ (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الورقة))) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN يد) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN دول) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المواجهة))))))) (CONJ او) (S (NP-TPC-7 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المفاوض) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN العربي)) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يكون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-7)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC مضعفا) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN موقع) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))) (PUNC ") (PUNC .))
